meanings.definition: In an epexegetical manner; serving as an explanation or addition to something previously stated.
meanings.sent1: She epexegetically clarified her point after the presentation.
meanings.sent2: The professor epexegetically elaborated on the key concepts in the lecture.
meanings.sent3: The comedian epexegetically added a funny twist to his joke, making the audience burst into laughter.
meanings.sent4: Her smile epexegetically brightened the room, bringing warmth to everyone present.
meanings.sent5: The stars in the night sky shone epexegetically, guiding travelers on their journey.
